duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate surveillance equipment and ensure accurate video documentation of irregular or deviant activities.
Observe guest and team member activities using surveillance camera equipment to monitor for criminal activity and gaming law violations.
Provide written factual reports daily of all violations and suspicious behavior observed and video taped.
Adhere to 'Confidentiality Rules' at all times and ensure that rules are enforced.
Monitor Casino Cage and Count Room, persons, and all employees on/or adjacent to the casino floor.
